title: Thomasville business owner who was stabbed by bank robbery suspect speaks to FOX8
content: 21:49 GMT - WGHP   Please enable Javascript to watch this video THOMASVILLE, N.C. – A Thomasville business owner who was stabbed by a bank robbery suspect after a police chase has been released from the hospital. Wes Anderson was released from the hospital Friday and spoke to FOX8 about the incident. "After they did the CT scan, they said I was real fortunate," said Anderson. “I think it …
